Pixel art, 200x200 tile, top-down orthographic cliff overlay only. Straight cliff segment spanning fully edge-to-edge (horizontal/vertical only; no diagonals). Rocky cliff face on the drop side, flat rim/ground on the opposite side with sparse grass tufts; no grass on the cliff face. North is top, east is right. Match thickness, palette, and line weight across all cliff sprites. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details. Solid royal purple background, full frame, no transparency. {orientation}

Pixel art, 200x200 tile, top-down orthographic cliff overlay only. Extremely simple Age of Empires 2 style. Concave right-angle cliff corner (innie). Cliff legs run from the midpoint of the bottom edge up to the center, then turn right to the midpoint of the east edge (clean 90° turn, no diagonal bridge; slight bow ok). Low/drop occupies the north and west edges; only the bottom-right (southeast) quadrant is higher rim/ground with sparse grass on the rim. Rocky cliff face on the low side only; no grass on the cliff face. Match thickness, palette, and line weight across all cliff sprites. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, clean silhouette, readable at a glance. Full-tile coverage, no border frame. Solid bright royal purple background (pure royal purple), full frame, no transparency.

Pixel art, 200x200 tile, top-down orthographic cliff overlay only. Extremely simple Age of Empires 2 style. Convex right-angle cliff corner (outie). A cliff runs from the midpoint of the bottom edge up to the center, then turns right to the midpoint of the right edge (clean 90° turn, no diagonal bridge; slight bow ok). The bottom-right quadrant is lower elevation; the other three quadrants are higher elevation with sparse grass on the rim. Rocky cliff face on the low side only; no grass on the cliff face. Match thickness, palette, and line weight across all cliff sprites. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, clean silhouette, readable at a glance. Full-tile coverage, no border frame. Solid bright royal purple background (pure royal purple), full frame, no transparency.

Pixel art, 1:1 sprite, extremely simple Age of Empires II villager. Single adult male villager, consistent design across all views: white tunic with a dark gray outline along the shirt edges, brown belt, tan pants, dark brown boots, light skin, short brown hair. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, readable at a glance. Full body, centered, zoomed to fill most of the frame with a little padding. Solid royal purple background (opaque), full frame filled with royal purple, no transparency, no checkerboard, no white/gray backdrop. No text, no UI, no extra props, no weapons. {orientation}
